p: JJS: While a PPV can technically be calculated, this is a case-control study, with the number of cases and controls purposefully selected by the study investigators; a PPV calculated from this study has no relation to a PPV applicable to the general population. However, of 25 patients with one of the typical Zika symptoms, 16 were cases (PPV=64%). Of the 11 patients with a Zika symptom and Zika+ by PCR or IgM, 7 were cases (PPV = 64%).
